title: Log in issue
body:
I cant log in get this popup saying we're unable to log you in because you may be offline, if you're seeing this message and you internet is available we recommend using the legacy client while we work to resolve this issue.
then when i click on legacy client it says could not connect to http server.
anyone else had this problem???

replies.body: we're unable to log you on because you may be offline

It definitely sounds like your network is having a hard time getting a solid connection with our login servers. You can try switching to ethernet if possible, but also check the points in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for some troubleshooting steps as well!
